conbody.p: Use this mode to send messages to a student, group, or the whole class.

ul.li: Select Message in the pop-up student menu (see section ) to send a message to this particular student.
Press Activity button in a group tab menu (see section ) and then select Message to send a message to the group.
Likewise, press Activity button in the class tab menu (see section ), and then select Message to send a message to the whole class.

conbody.p: A message window ( ) will appear on your screen that will note the recipient.
Enter your message and press OK _fixme_ button.
conbody.note: Use Ctrl+Enter to start a new line in the message text.
